content: the willow poncho is a stunning crochet pattern featuring granny squares with a beautiful willow design feminine and lacy this poncho is perfect for layering over your favorite outfits with playful tassels adding a touch of whimsy whether you re dressing up or keeping it casual the willow poncho is a versatile accessory for any wardrobe this pattern is designed for sizes xs to 4xl with simple adjustments add extra rounds to the granny squares to create the perfect fit for your size with clear step-by-step instructions and easy construction this pattern is beginner-friendly yet satisfying for experienced crocheters pattern details skill level easy sizes xs 32 to 4xl 58 adjust by adding extra rounds to the granny squares design granny squares with willow motif lacy texture and tassels construction easy and straightforward format free on blog or paid pdf available create a beautiful customizable poncho with this pattern whether for yourself or as a handmade gift the willow poncho is sure to become a cherished piece share your creations on ravelry i can t wait to see them
